content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-1\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"2. Data Protection Controls\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-2\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"No Access by Default\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"By default, EPAM prefers not to have access to production data (including personal information / PII) and EPAM personnel should seek alternatives to accessing, handling or processing such production data (including personal information / PII).\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"According to the company policy, EPAM should avoid wherever possible  accessing, using, storing, handling or processing live/production data for test purposes and only fictitious test data is acceptable.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Customer production data (either complete sets or masked parts) are not and shall not be used for testing on EPAM's premises or in the public cloud.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If any data that seems to be personal information or PII is received from the Customer, the Project Manager or Account Manager must seek written confirmation from the Customer that the data is fictitious test data and not personal information / production / PII data. Until such written confirmation is received from the Customer, such data shall be handled as if it were personal information (or PII) and (except if EPAM would be in breach of contract) their usage for testing purposes shall be suspended.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-2\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Only Upon Authorized Request\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If a Customer asks for support/maintenance related works on their production data, (including any personal information or  PII data), then the authorized EPAM employee(s) shall act by strictly following the security measures specified in the Contract, Master Service Agreement or Statement of Work,
